name: PortalTurret
0:
”Alexa, ask Portal Turret to Give me a Portal Turret Quote”
”Alexa, ask Portal Turret to Tell me a Portal Turret Quote”
”Alexa, ask Portal Turret to quote Portal Turrets”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: portal turret
des:
Have Alexa act as a Turret from Portal, reading off Portal Turret Quotes

Quotes from:
https://theportalwiki.com/wiki/Turret_voice_lines

Credit https://greenysvk.deviantart.com/ for original Turret "Lense"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
